        What is LibApps? LibApps at University of California, Riverside Libraries is a platform powering LibGuides, LibAnswers, LibCal,
        LibInsight, and other Springshare tools licensed by your institution.
     
 
 Browser Support:  Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. Cookies must be enabled.
